title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: TextPopup text box, which provides the data binding function.

title: Prompt Placeholder Text
content:
The value of the

placeholder attribute is string. This attribute displays the value in the text box by default.
findIntroStr: TextPopup text box, which provides the data binding function.

title: Read-only
content: You can use readonly to set whether to read only.
findIntroStr: TextPopup text box, which provides the data binding function.

title: Separator
content: You can use separtor to set the separator. Enter the position of the separator in the text box and press Enter.
findIntroStr: TextPopup text box, which provides the data binding function.

title: Bound Value
content: You can set the binding value using value or v-model.
findIntroStr: TextPopup text box, which provides the data binding function.
